NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION:
A simple app designed to help you to plan out your retirement

If you want to skip the tutorial, tap skip on the top right hand side
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION:
This is your signup and login page

Tap 'SIGN IN' if you already have an account, if not, create a new one by tapping 'SIGN UP'
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION:
The profile page displays your account details and your saved charts in the area highlighted in RED, and a sidemenu circled in ORANGE

You can edit your profile by tapping the pencil icon
TUTORIAL_SLIDE5_DESCRIPTION: Your sidemenu helps to provide you an easy way to access all of the features of our app, as well as the place to sign out
TUTORIAL_SLIDE6_DESCRIPTION:
Generating a new chart is easy, just fill out all of the fields

The two info buttons circled in RED, helps to provide you additional info about what you are entering
TUTORIAL_SLIDE7_DESCRIPTION: Your info is processed and displayed by this chart, showing your best age to retire at, what age you need be to break even, and what you will receive in monthly benefits in the GREEN BAR, compared to your total benefits in the BLUE BAR
TUTORIAL_SLIDE8_DESCRIPTION:
Before saving, you can customize your chart by adjusting the sliders in the area highlighted in RED below

The DARK BLUE point adjusts your retirement age while the ORANGE point adjusts your life expectancy
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
